visualization_prompt: Generate a column chart showing penguin species distribution using categorical color encoding

subtitle.text: Total counts of Palmer Penguin species, from the Palmer Penguins dataset

accessibility.description: Column chart comparing population counts of three penguin species: Adelie (152), Gentoo (124), and Chinstrap (68).

visualization_explanation: The visualization presents a univariate categorical distribution of penguin species counts using a column chart. Three discrete categories (Chinstrap, Gentoo, Adelie) are mapped to quantitative values through vertical bar lengths. Synthetic data preserves original dataset proportions (Adelie > Gentoo > Chinstrap) with exact counts from source. The column chart maximizes data-ink ratio by eliminating redundant gridlines and legend, using direct data labels. Cairo's principles are applied through pre-attentive color coding (distinct hues per species) and proportional encoding. Color choices (#FF6347, #32CD32, #1E90FF) provide 4.5:1 contrast ratios against background, complying with WCAG AA standards. Axis labeling follows Tufte's clear value reporting with direct count annotations.
